QuestData.Title: Seek Out Tabetha
QuestData.Description: The arms you captured in Blackhoof Village have not seen any combat beyond mere training exercises, which means the Grimtotems who destroyed the Shady Rest are still at large.$B$BTo the south, in the heart of the Quagmire, lives the witch Tabetha. Though she is a human, she has dealt honorably with us and trained some of our mages.$B$BAsk her for assistance in tracking down the band of Grimtotem responsible for burning the inn. The Alliance must not be allowed to think we were complicit in the attack.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Tabetha at her farm in the Quagmire.
QuestData.RewardText: <Tabetha smiles slightly.>$B$BKrog wishes me to scry for the Grimtotems, eh? Well, I have no need of magic in this case.$B$BIt seems we have a mutual enemy. The Grimtotems have built an outpost nearby and are a constant thorn in the side of me and my students.
